node.title: Sir Lewis Hamilton receives his knighthood days after dramatic F1 finale
node.alt: Prince knights a man in a castle.
node.description: Just days after coming agonisingly short of winning his eighth championship in the highly controversial Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, Sir Lewis receivesÂ his knighthood from Prince Charles.
node.content:
["Seven-time Formula 1 world\u00a0champion Lewis Hamilton has been knighted at Windsor Castle.\u00a0", "Just days after coming agonisingly short of winning his eighth drivers' championship in the controversial Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, Sir Lewis received his knighthood from Prince Charles.", "The 36-year-old was knighted after being on the 2021 New Year Honours list after he equalled Michael Schumacher's record of seven championships in 2020.\u00a0", "The Mercedes driver attended the ceremony with his mother, Carmen Lockhart.\u00a0", "Sir Lewis did not speak to reporters after the ceremony, only posing for pictures in the quadrangle at Windsor Castle.\u00a0", "He is the fourth F1 driver to be knighted after Australian Sir Jack Brabham, Sir Stirling Moss and Sir Jackie Stewart.\u00a0", "Sir Lewis is the first to receive his knighthood while still competing.", "", "
Sir Lewis with his mother, Carmen Lockhart, after receiving his knighthood.\u00a0(Pool via Reuters, Andrew Matthews)
", "The newly knighted driver is expected to attend the official F1 prize-giving ceremony in Paris on Thursday evening (local time)\u00a0despite his team contesting the result of the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.\u00a0", "Sir Lewis, needing to finish ahead of Max Verstappen to win his eighth title on Sunday, had a lead of more than 10 seconds when a late safety car\u00a0sent the championship decider into chaos.", "The Mercedes star did not have time to come into the pits for new tyres and still emerge in the race lead, while Verstappen did have that luxury in second place.", "Race director Michael Masi then made a controversial decision to allow only the lapped cars between Sir Lewis and Verstappen through, despite seemingly contravening the sport's regulations.", "Verstappen overtook Sir Lewis on the final lap to win his first drivers' championship, while Mercedes immediately lodged two protests which were dismissed.\u00a0", "Mercedes has announced intentions to appeal both of those dismissals.\u00a0\u00a0\u00a0"]
